name: DailySignal
text:
Tomorrow is the 155th anniversary of #Juneteenth—which marks the day slaves in Texas found out they were freed by President Lincoln’s Emancipation Proclamation. 

Professor Lucas Morel joins the podcast with insights you wont' want to miss: https://t.co/3SqpGFfpa8

name: DailySignal
text:
What we need now is for public school principals to work with their school boards and have a curriculum- and textbook-adoption process in place to secure excellent resources in schools across the country.

Parents should demand they do so. https://t.co/4fSwHgznFx

name: DailySignal
text: National civics standards won’t correct a fundamental misalignment in power and incentives that exists due to an absence of #schoolchoice for most families. https://t.co/4fSwHgznFx

name: DailySignal
text: The U.S. and its free world partners have the chance to empower the free world not only to overcome the challenges of COVID-19—but also to make our nations more resilient for the multitude of challenges of the 21st century https://t.co/Ppuy5ITJNB

name: DailySignal
text: Responding to the Coronavirus Crisis and Building a Stronger Health Sector for the Future: https://t.co/JJBulmw74L

name: DailySignal
text: “The PREVENTS office is currently reviewing the $1.5 billion of federal funding committed to suicide prevention to make sure research goes where it is most needed in order to save lives and to make lives better” https://t.co/WpsVa2j8bQ

name: DailySignal
text: If this trend continues unabated, we will lose our grip on our culture of free speech—and our free society along with it. https://t.co/j0XrBYLk58

name: DailySignal
text: The COVID-19 pandemic has exposed how government red tape gets in the way of a rapid response and interferes with patients being able to quickly and efficiently get the care they need from those they trust. https://t.co/U8JYEw2JpW

name: DailySignal
text: States should allow districts to reopen schools as soon as possible. https://t.co/o4er2qOCfh

name: DailySignal
text:
RT @RobertBluey: Friday is the 155th anniversary of #Juneteenth, which marks the day slaves in Texas found out that they were freed by President Abraham Lincoln’s Emancipation Proclamation. 

@LincolnDouglass shares more on today's @DailySignal podcast. https://t.co/DMqE3ozcNH via @LRacheldG

name: DailySignal
text:
U.S. Trade Representative Robert Lighthizer denied Wednesday that President Trump asked Chinese President Xi for help in the upcoming presidential election.

“Absolutely untrue, never happened. I was there...” https://t.co/JVP1nsG4Yc

name: DailySignal
text:
Education, especially reading and history, is an important component of American society. 

The ability to read well is fundamentally linked to understanding history and good governance. https://t.co/dhgFrAh3zl
